Texts.Eng: The expiry date for this coupon appears to be the week before your Protectorate graduation ceremony.

This coupon entitles the holder - yes, you! - to a life-changing experience. Come on down to Antonio's Bargain Pizzeria, just a short walk from the Protectorate Academy, and enjoy the fabulous value of 3 grande pizzas for the price of two and a half! Don't wait, drop by today!
